source_dir.description: Session folder to scan and annotate (defaults to output_session_folder).
source_dir.title: Source Dir

assume_yes.description: If true, skip interactive confirmations and use defaults.
assume_yes.title: Assume Yes

default_targeted_structure.description: Default targeted structure (Allen CCF acronym) suggested to operator per meta file.
default_targeted_structure.title: Default Targeted Structure

validate_targeted_structure_ccf.description: If true, validate targeted_structure against the Allen Brain CCF structure acronym list when possible.
validate_targeted_structure_ccf.title: Validate Targeted Structure Ccf

default_green_channel_target.description: Default Intended Green Channel Target (asked once per experiment if not provided).
default_green_channel_target.title: Default Green Channel Target

default_red_channel_target.description: Default Intended Red Channel Target (asked once per experiment if not provided).
default_red_channel_target.title: Default Red Channel Target

default_slap2_mode.description: Default SLAP2 mode (asked once per acquisition / meta pair if not provided).
default_slap2_mode.title: Default Slap2 Mode

default_pia_depth_on_remote_focus_dmd1_u.description: Default depth of pia on remote focus for DMD1 (microns). Used as per-file default; operator can override per .meta.
default_pia_depth_on_remote_focus_dmd1_u.title: Default Pia Depth On Remote Focus Dmd1 Um

default_pia_depth_on_remote_focus_dmd2_u.description: Default depth of pia on remote focus for DMD2 (microns). Used as per-file default; operator can override per .meta.
default_pia_depth_on_remote_focus_dmd2_u.title: Default Pia Depth On Remote Focus Dmd2 Um

default_target_name.description: Default target name (format NeuronX or FOVX) used when assume_yes is true.
default_target_name.title: Default Target Name

dynamic_dir.description: Relative destination for dynamic acquisition files (under session folder).
dynamic_dir.title: Dynamic Dir

structure_dir.description: Relative destination for structure stack files (under session folder).
structure_dir.title: Structure Dir

ref_stack_dir.description: Relative destination for reference stack files (under session folder).
ref_stack_dir.title: Ref Stack Dir

manifest_name.description: Filename for the routing/annotation manifest (written under launcher_metadata).
manifest_name.title: Manifest Name

manifest_path.description: Optional manifest path (absolute or relative to session folder) to override the default under launcher_metadata.
manifest_path.title: Manifest Path
